sentences.chinese: 昔自在古，歷建正作於孟春。
sentences.literal: Formerly in ancient times, calendar established correct made at first spring.

sentences.chinese: 於時冰泮發蟄，百草奮興，秭鳺先滜。
sentences.literal: At that time ice melts awakens hibernating, hundred grasses vigorously arise, nest duck first swims.

sentences.chinese: 物乃歲具，生於東，次順四時，卒于冬分。
sentences.literal: Things then year complete, born from east, next follows four seasons, ends at winter division.
Time rooster three calls, ends bright.
Strokes twelve month sections, ends at Chou.
Sun moon complete, therefore bright also.

sentences.chinese: 明者孟也，幽者幼也，幽明者雌雄也。
sentences.literal: Bright ones first also, dark ones young also, dark bright ones female male also.

sentences.chinese: 雌雄代興，而順至正之統也。
sentences.literal: Female male alternately flourish, and follows arrives correct rule also.
Sun returns to west, rises bright in east;
Moon returns to east, rises bright in west.

sentences.chinese: 正不率天，又不由人，則凡事易壞而難成矣。
sentences.literal: Correct not follows heaven, moreover not by human, then all affairs easy bad and difficult complete already.

sentences.chinese: 王者易姓受命，必慎始初，改正朔，易服色，推本天元，順承厥意。
sentences.literal: Kings change surname receive mandate, must careful beginnings initial, correct new moon, change clothing colors, trace root heaven origin, comply receive their intention.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：神農以前尚矣。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian says: Shennong before still remote.

sentences.chinese: 蓋黃帝考定星歷，建立五行，起消息，正閏餘，於是有天地神祇物類之官，是謂五官。
sentences.literal: Indeed Yellow Emperor examined fixed star calendar, established five phases, raised wax wane, corrected intercalary remainder, thereupon had heaven earth spirits deities things categories officials, this called five officials.
Each governs their sequence, not mutually chaotic also.
